overview: Kevin, Tasya, Riska, Edwin and Andre are 5 friends who haven't been together for a long time. Finally they agreed to a camping reunion in a mountainous area ... Strange things began to happen, Riska suddenly disappeared from the tent, Andre was very upset, because he had warned his friends not to enter the forbidden forest area ... When Renda had not met, Andre suddenly appeared with a face full of blood. .. The atmosphere at that night was getting tense .. Kevin should be able to find Riska and reveal the creature that hurt Andre .. Are all these actions of the creatures who inhabit the forbidden forest.
title: Surprise
